chunk:
withSimplicity Makeup Remover

Brand: withSimplicity

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: *Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides (Fractionated Coconut Oil), *Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, *Prunus
Dulcet (Sweet Almond) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E) Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil

Directions: Apply 1-2 pumps to cotton round or
tiss

cotton round or
tissue and use to remove makeup.
Finish by washing skin. Can be used for
double cleansing.

Warnings: none

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
